ui.panel.page-onboarding.intro: Are you ready to awaken your home, reclaim your privacy and join a worldwide community of tinkerers?
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.intro: Let's get started by creating a user account.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.data.name: Name
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.int: Hello {name}, welcome to Home Assistant. How would you like to name your home?
We would like to know where you live. This information will help with displaying information and setting up sun-based automations. This data is never shared outside of your network.
We can help you fill in this information by making a one-time request to an external service.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.loc: Name of your Home Assistant installation
ui.panel.page-onboarding.ais-restore-bac: Do you want to restore your system configuration from a backup?
Log in to the integrator portal:
If you have password protected backup, enter the password:
Select the gate from which you want to restore the configuration:
Restoring configuration from backup... wait for restart
ui.panel.page-onboarding.integration.int: Devices and services are represented in Home Assistant as integrations. You can set them up now, or do it later from the configuration screen.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.mob-integration: Enhance your Home Assistant experience by installing our official Android mobile app. Scan the code or click it:
With the application, you can control voice commands from your phone, receive notifications of events at home, control from outside the home, report your location to the gate, etc..
You can also install other mobile application Home Assistant Companion:
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.descrip: Taip pat galite atkurti iš ankstesnės momentinės kopijos.
